title: Stock Price Prediction using Machine Learning
description: Predicting the stock market is one of the most important applications of Machine Learning in finance. In this article, I will take you through a simple Data Science project on Stock Price Prediction using Machine Learning Python.At the end of this article, you will learn how to predict stock prices by using the Linear Regression model by implementing the Python programming language.Also, Read – Machine Learning Full Course for free.
